original_text: Then they ran and took him from there. And when he stood among the people, he was taller than any of the people from his shoulders upward.
korean_text: 그들이 달려 가서 거기서 그를 데려오매 그가 백성 중에 서니 다른 사람보다 어깨 위만큼 컸더라

sentences.original_text: And when he stood among the people,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 백성 가운데 섰을 때,

sentences.original_text: he was taller than any of the people
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 어떤 백성보다 더 컸습니다
